body: The described behavior is implemented by choosing `Html::activeInput()` vs. `Html::input()` not sure if there is a good way to move the functionality to the base class. https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/c9347b0a5702ecd69c3a596bebac174a4dd218b4/framework/widgets/MaskedInput.php#L127-L131
Found a solution, see my PR #14441

issue.body:
to implement behavior described in class docs directly in the class
itself instead of relying on subclasses to respect the description.

fixes #14294
